name: UIDocumentBrowserViewControllerDelegate
desc: The protocol you implement to respond as the user interacts with the document browser.

items.name: func documentBrowser(UIDocumentBrowserViewController, didRequestDocumentCreationWithHandler: (URL?, UIDocumentBrowserViewController.ImportMode) -> Void)
items.desc: Asks the delegate to create a new document.

items.name: func documentBrowser(UIDocumentBrowserViewController, didImportDocumentAt: URL, toDestinationURL: URL)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a document has been successfully imported.

items.name: func documentBrowser(UIDocumentBrowserViewController, failedToImportDocumentAt: URL, error: Error?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the document browser failed to import the specified document.

items.name: func documentBrowser(UIDocumentBrowserViewController, didPickDocumentsAt: [URL])
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user has selected one or more documents.

items.name: func documentBrowser(UIDocumentBrowserViewController, willPresent: UIActivityViewController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the document browser will display an activity view.

items.name: func documentBrowser(UIDocumentBrowserViewController, applicationActivitiesForDocumentURLs: [URL]) -> [UIActivity]
items.desc: Asks the delegate for additional activities when displaying an activity view.
